description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for managing and displaying budget categories with their limits. It includes functionality to load budgets from an API, add new budgets, and display progress indicators for each budget category.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that displays a list of budgets and allows users to add new budget categories.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the budget data, API interactions, and UI updates for the BudgetsScreen widget.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches budgets data from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates a new budget category by sending data to the API.

methods.name: _money
methods.description: Formats a number as a currency string with a dollar sign.
